abilities.name: Elementalist
abilities.details: As a master of all elements, Ciarra's abilities will alternate between Arcane Mode and Mystic Mode. In Arcane Mode, her abilities will focus on protection and area control, while in Mystic Mode, they will focus on magic damage.[n]When Ciarra uses her ability, she will fill up her Elemental Gauge. When the gauge is full, she will automatically switch to the other mode.[n]Arcane Mode: Ciarra will recover a small percentage of her [mp]missing mana[/] every second.[n]Mystic Mode: her abilities will deal additional [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]).

abilities.name: Arcanic Stone / Mystical Flare
abilities.details: Arcane Mode: Ciarra will cast a sharp stone in a target direction, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) to the first enemy hit. The stone will shatter upon impact and deal lesser magical damage to the enemies behind.[n]Mystic Mode: Ciarra will cast a blast of fire in a target direction, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) to all enemies in a small radius around the first enemy hit.

abilities.name: Arcanic Ice / Mystical Bolt
abilities.details: Arcane Mode: Ciarra will summon a blizzard in a target area, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) and [db]slowing[/] all enemies inside.[n]Mystic Mode: Ciarra will cast a lightning bolt that strike in a target area after a short delay, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) and reducing their [mr]resistance[/].

abilities.name: Arcanic Gale / Mystical Flora
abilities.details: Arcane Mode: Ciarra will cast a wind gale on a target path, increasing her and allies' [ms]movement speed[/] for a short duration.[n]Mystic Mode: Ciarra will summon several sprouts on a target path. After a short duration, they will grow into thorns and grab onto all enemies within the area, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) and [db]rooting[/] them down for a short duration.

abilities.name: Arcanic Light / Mystical Void
abilities.details: Arcane Mode: Ciarra will cast a field of light around herself, pushing all enemies out of the field and stopping all enemies who attempt to dash into or within the field. If a target is successfully interrupted, they will be dealt [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) and [db]knocked up[/] for a brief duration.[n]Mystic Mode: Ciarra will cast a shroud of darkness at a target area that constantly deals [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) for several seconds. The shroud will slowly [db]expand, reducing vision[/] of all enemies within.
